gamerule.lightningConvertsPigs.descripti: Lightning converts Pigs to Zombified Piglins
gamerule.lightningConvertsMooshrooms.des: Lightning converts Mooshrooms from Red to Brown, and vice versa
gamerule.lightningConvertsGuardians.desc: Lightning converts Guardians to Elder Guardians
gamerule.lightningChargesCreepers.descri: When Creepers are struck by lightning, they become charged
gamerule.lightningDamage.description: Entities take damage when struct by lightning
gamerule.lightningFire.description: Lightning sets nearby blocks on fire
gamerule.lightningGrowsSlimes.descriptio: When struck, slimes are grown to epic proportion
gamerule.lightningSlimeSize.description: Size that slimes are set to after beings struck by lightning
